Posted By: Antares2 (8/1/2011 12:21:41 PM)

posts.post_content:
I have an artifact-based standard deck and this card is pure gold. My favorite pairing with this card is [Etched Champion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etched Champion). When metalcraft is active (easy to achieve in a deck with 25+ artifacts), I suddenly have a 4/4 beater with protection from all colors.
  
   
This card also helps boost the fragile [Steel Overseer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steel Overseer).
  
   
I give the card a 4.5/5, simply because it can be game-breaking in an artifact deck.
posts.html:

This card also helps boost the fragile Steel Overseer.

I give the card a 4.5/5, simply because it can be game-breaking in an artifact deck.

Posted By: BegleOne (12/19/2010 11:13:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card is at least 4.5/5. If it looks good at first glance, it passes the play test with an A+ mark. People, this baby can easily mean, in the right deck, 4 or 5 Ornithopters, 2/4 evasive flyers, by turn 3. Add some Glint Hawk Idol fun (4/4 flyer that, 90% of the time, can't be the target of sorceries), and you have yourself an the base for an original, yet competitive standard deck. I say original because your deck wont have Goblin Guides and Geopedes, like everyone else's.
posts.html:
